title: Frozen Mallet changes
body:
Frozen Mallet never gets used. How about I propose some change to get a discussion going.

Build Price 2600g - Giants belt + Pickaxe + Recipe 

400HP
30AD
Unique Passive: Stacking slow 5% per hit max 6 hits (30%)
On 6th hit, target is frozen/stunned for 1.5 seconds taking 10% missing health as magic damage. Only occurs once. (melee only?)

The changes are for melee champs that have little to no cc, plenty of counter play available, just dont get hit for a 6th time and get frozen.

replies.body:
a) f.m currently has below 2% popularity.
b) very true, riven and renekton would be op, maybe id remove the ad damage altogether.

Any ideas what should be done with it to increase its usefulness?

a) frozen mallet does get used sometimes.
b) this is broken OP on some melee champs (read Riven/Renekton/any champ that can keep you close for 6 autos.)
